mapper.select: WITH FULL_PATH AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN G.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020201L' THEN 'IMPALA' ELSE J.OBJ_ATR_VAL END AS PDA_HADOOP_GUBUN /* PAD HADOOP 구분 */ , Z.OBJ_ID || '_' || B.OBJ_ATR_VAL || '_' || B1.OBJ_ABBR_NM || '_' || ROWNUM AS LOOKUP_UNIQUE_KEY , G.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS LOOKUP_TYPE_ID , G.OBJ_ID AS LOOKUP_ID , B.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS LOOKUP_TABLE , C.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS LOOKUP_KEY , D.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS LOOKUP_TYPE , E.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS LOOKUP_VALUE , B1.OBJ_NM AS DATASET_ATTR /* 데이터셋 속성명 */ , B1.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS DATASET_ATTR_ENG /* 데이터셋 속성명 */ , B1.OBJ_NM AS ATR_NM , B.OBJ_ATR_VAL || CHR(13) || CHR(10) || 'Lookup Key: ' || C.OBJ_ATR_VAL || CHR(13) || CHR(10) || 'Lookup Type: ' || D.OBJ_ATR_VAL || CHR(13) || CHR(10) || 'Lookup Value: ' || E.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS LOOKUP_NM , A.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID AS TECH_OBJ_ID , F.OBJ_NM AS TECH_OBJ_NM , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.OBJ_ID, 9, 7) = 'BDP_PDA' THEN 'PDA' ELSE 'IMPALA' END MAIN_DB_GUBUN , Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DATASET_TYPE_ID , Z.OBJ_ID AS DATASET_ID , Z.OBJ_NM AS DATASET_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M Z /* 데이터셋(L1) */ LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_R A /* 기술 데이터셋(L1) */ ON (Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID = A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND Z.OBJ_ID = A.REL_OBJ_ID AND A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010201L', '010205L', '010207L') AND A.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('020102L', '020103L', '020202L', '020203L') AND A.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M B1 /* 데이터셋 속성 */ ON (A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = B1.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND A.REL_OBJ_ID = B1.PATH_OBJ_ID AND B1.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010202L', '010206L') AND B1.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_D B /* 데이터셋 속성(LOOKUP TABLE) */ ON (B1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = B.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND B1.OBJ_ID = B.OBJ_ID AND B.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010202L', '010206L') AND B.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND B.ATR_VAL_SEQ =101 AND B.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_D C /* 데이터셋 속성(LOOKUP KEY) */ ON (B1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = C.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND B1.OBJ_ID = C.OBJ_ID AND C.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010202L', '010206L') AND C.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND C.ATR_VAL_SEQ =101 AND C.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D /* 데이터셋 속성(LOOKUP TYPE) */ ON (B1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND B1.OBJ_ID = D.OBJ_ID AND D.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010202L', '010206L') AND D.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D.ATR_VAL_SEQ =101 AND D.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_D E /* 데이터셋 속성(LOOKUP VALUE) */ ON (B1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = E.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND B1.OBJ_ID = E.OBJ_ID AND E.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010202L', '010206L') AND E.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 AND E.ATR_VAL_SEQ =101 AND E.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M F /* 기술테이블 */ ON (A.OBJ_TYPE_ID = F.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND A.OBJ_ID = F.OBJ_ID AND F.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('020102L', '020103L', '020202L', '020203L') AND F.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M G /* LOOKUP 테이블 조인 */ ON (G.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('020102L', '020103L', '020202L', '020203L') AND B.OBJ_ATR_VAL = UPPER(G.OBJ_NM)) LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M H /* 데이터베이스 */ ON (G.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = H.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND G.PATH_OBJ_ID = H.OBJ_ID AND H.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020101L' AND H.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M I /* DB인스턴스 */ ON (H.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = I.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND H.PATH_OBJ_ID = I.OBJ_ID AND I.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020100L' AND I.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_D J /* DB인스턴스 DETAIL */ ON (I.OBJ_TYPE_ID = J.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND I.OBJ_ID = J.OBJ_ID AND J.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020100L' AND J.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND J.DEL_YN ='N') WHERE Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND Z.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND Z.DEL_YN ='N' AND B.OBJ_ATR_VAL IS NOT NULL AND CASE WHEN G.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020201L' THEN 'IMPALA' ELSE J.OBJ_ATR_VAL END = CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.OBJ_ID, 9, 7) = 'BDP_PDA' THEN 'PDA' ELSE 'IMPALA' END AND (G.OBJ_ID LIKE '020202L_BDP_HADOOP_PROD%' OR G.OBJ_ID LIKE '020102L_BDP_PDA_PROD%') ) , NON_LOOKUP_DATASET AS ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID AS TECH_OBJ_ID , F.OBJ_NM AS TECH_OBJ_NM , Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DATASET_TYPE_ID , Z.OBJ_ID AS DATASET_ID , Z.OBJ_NM AS DATASET_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M Z LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_R A ON (Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID = A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND Z.OBJ_ID = A.REL_OBJ_ID AND A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010201L', '010205L', '010207L') AND A.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('020102L', '020103L', '020202L', '020203L') AND A.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN PEN_OBJ_M F ON (A.OBJ_TYPE_ID = F.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND A.OBJ_ID = F.OBJ_ID AND F.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('020102L', '020103L', '020202L', '020203L') AND F.DEL_YN ='N') LEFT JOIN FULL_PATH G ON (Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID = G.DATASET_TYPE_ID AND Z.OBJ_ID = G.DATASET_ID) WHERE Z.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND Z.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND Z.DEL_YN ='N' AND G.DATASET_TYPE_ID IS NULL ) SELECT TB1.OBJ_TYPE_ID , TB1.OBJ_ID , TB1.UNQ_OBJ_ID , TB1.OBJ_NM , TB1.POBJ_TYPE_ID , TB1.POBJ_ID , TB1.POBJ_NM , TB1.DATASET_ATTR , TB1.DATASET_ATTR_ENG , TB1.LVL , TB1.LEAF_YN FROM ( SELECT LOOKUP_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , LOOKUP_ID AS OBJ_ID , LOOKUP_UNIQUE_KEY AS UNQ_OBJ_ID , LOOKUP_NM AS OBJ_NM , TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS POBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID AS POBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM AS POBJ_NM , 3 AS LVL , 'Y' AS LEAF_YN , DATASET_ATTR , DATASET_ATTR_ENG FROM FULL_PATH GROUP BY LOOKUP_TYPE_ID , LOOKUP_ID , LOOKUP_UNIQUE_KEY , LOOKUP_NM , TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM , DATASET_ATTR , DATASET_ATTR_ENG UNION ALL SELECT TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM , DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM , 2 AS LVL , 'N' AS LEAF_YN , NULL , NULL FROM FULL_PATH GROUP BY TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM , DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM UNION ALL SELECT TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM , DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM , 2 AS LVL , 'N' AS LEAF_YN , NULL , NULL FROM NON_LOOKUP_DATASET GROUP BY TECH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , TECH_OBJ_ID , TECH_OBJ_NM , DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_NM , DATASET_ID UNION ALL SELECT DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM , '' , '' , '' , 1 AS LVL , 'N' AS LEAF_YN , NULL , NULL FROM FULL_PATH GROUP BY DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM UNION ALL SELECT DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM , '' , '' , '' , 1 AS LVL , 'N' AS LEAF_YN , NULL , NULL FROM NON_LOOKUP_DATASET GROUP BY DATASET_TYPE_ID , DATASET_ID , DATASET_NM ) TB1 ORDER BY LVL

WITH ORG_TREE (ORG_ID, ORG_NM, UP_ORG_ID, ORG_PATH_NM, ORG_PATH_CD, LVL) AS ( SELECT T101.CODE AS ORG_ID , T101.EX_DEPT_NAME AS ORG_NM , T101.EX_DEPT_PARENT_CD AS UP_ORG_ID , T101.EX_DEPT_NAME AS ORG_PATH_NM , T101.CODE AS ORG_PATH_CD , 1 AS LVL FROM PTL_STAL_COM_ORG T101 WHERE T101.EX_DEPT_PARENT_CD = '00000000' UNION ALL SELECT T101.CODE AS ORG_ID , T101.EX_DEPT_NAME AS ORG_NM , T101.EX_DEPT_PARENT_CD AS UP_ORG_ID , T102.ORG_PATH_NM || ' > ' || T101.EX_DEPT_NAME AS ORG_PATH_NM , T102.ORG_PATH_CD || T101.CODE AS ORG_PATH_CD , T102.LVL+1 AS LVL FROM PTL_STAL_COM_ORG T101 INNER JOIN ORG_TREE T102 ON ( T101.EX_DEPT_PARENT_CD = T102.ORG_ID ) ) SELECT T101.* FROM ORG_TREE T101
AND UPPER(T101.ORG_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY T101.ORG_PATH_CD

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, '' AS EX_DEPT_NAME, '' AS EX_LGT_PSTN_DV_NM, '' AS EMAIL_ADDR,HP_NO FROM PEN_USER_M T101
AND UPPER(T101.USER_ID) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND UPPER(T101.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY T101.USER_NM

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_101 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_102 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_103 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_104 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_105 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T103.OBJ_NM END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_105NM , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_106 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_107 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_108 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_109 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 110 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_110 FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T103.OBJ_ID AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsetAtrTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsetTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{dsetId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC ORDER BY MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN TO_CHAR(T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL, '000009') END)

SELECT A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DATASET_TYPE_ID , A.REL_OBJ_ID AS DATASET_ID , A.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS SERVICE_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID AS SERVICE_ID , B.OBJ_NM AS SERVICE_NM , LPAD(B.OBJ_ABBR_NM, 7, '0') SORT FROM PEN_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M B ON ( A.OBJ_TYPE_ID = B.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND A.OBJ_ID = B.OBJ_ID AND B.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE A.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsetTypeId} AND A.REL_OBJ_ID = #{dsetId} AND A.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' ORDER BY LPAD(B.OBJ_ABBR_NM, 7, '0')

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.PATH_OBJ_ID , MAX (T103.ADM_OBJ_ID) AS DATA_LAYER , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DBMS_TYPE FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010901L' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsgnTabTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{dsgnTabId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.PATH_OBJ_ID

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_101 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_102 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_103 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_104 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_105 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_107 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_108 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_111 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_112 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 113 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_113 , MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 115 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ATR_ID_SEQ_115 FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsgnTabColTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{dsgnTabTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{dsgnTabId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC ORDER BY MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN TO_CHAR(T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL, '000009') END)

WITH ATR_SET AS ( ${ATR_SET_QUERY} ) SELECT T101.ATR_NM , T102.ADM_OBJ_ID AS COL_NM , CASE WHEN #{dbmsType} = 'ORACLE' THEN MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) WHEN #{dbmsType} = 'PDA' THEN MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) WHEN #{dbmsType} = 'IMPALA' THEN MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 113 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) END AS DATA_TYPE , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_LEN , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_POINT_LEN FROM ATR_SET T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 /* 표준용어 */ ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T102.OBJ_NM = T101.ATR_NM ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T103 /* 표준도메인 ID */ ON ( T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID AND T103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T104 /* 표준도메인 상세 */ ON ( T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010303L' AND T104.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) GROUP BY T101.ATR_NM , T102.ADM_OBJ_ID
